alert.note: Alert for Orange; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 09 at 8:03PM EDT until July 11 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New York NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey...New York... Ramapo River near Mahwah affecting Bergen, Rockland, Passaic and Orange Counties. For the Ramapo River...including Mahwah...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ramapo River Mahwah. * WHEN...From late tonight to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding along Route 202. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 8.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.5 feet on 07/14/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Ramapo River Mahwah 8.0 7.5 Sun 7 pm EDT 8.2 6.8 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Monday morning at 800 AM EDT.
